document.full_text: <xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffe0a6">Surgeons </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">must </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">be </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">very </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffacc8">careful </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">When </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">they </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">take </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff88a2">knife! </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff88a2">Underneath </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">their </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff88a2">fine </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff88a2">incisions </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ecb894">Stirs </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff4614">Culprit </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffacc8">Life! </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p>
